Package ooga.model.components.moveconditions

Class Condition

java.lang.Object
ooga.model.components.moveconditions.Condition
Direct Known Subclasses:
MoveOtherPiece, PawnPromotion
public abstract class Condition
extends java.lang.Object
Meant to be used as a component of a piece movement object. Gives the movement a condition that is executed if true.

      Constructor used to hold things that many piece movement objects may need
      Parameters:
      viewController - The controller used to communicate with the front end
      gameBoard - The board that the pieces are on.
      parameters - The map with parameters, if there are any
      piece - The piece that the restriction corresponds to
